body.p:
Carrollton Ky
Mch. 7. 1861
Honbl. Beriah Magoffin
Govenofr of Comwth Ky

We the undersigned your petitioners would respectfully state to your excellency that at the Aug term 1860 of the Carroll Circuit Court We were fined $20 each for gaming on premises we state that we are poor men with large families that the gaming was for amusement the wager being a treat. We further state that we are not Gamblers, and will in future not handle the "papers." We pray your excellency to remit said fines --

Charles Wright
Bluford Sidebotton } Petitioners
H,, Cox
Jno R Vance
W. M Fisher
As Clerk of Said Circuit Court I certify that the statements made in the above Petition are substantially true

Carroll Cir Ct
$20 } Gaming
Wright & Sidebottom
